Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be significantly higher than its manufacturing cost, making it a valuable asset for any business looking to streamline processes and increase productivity.

I am offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This price reflects not only the tangible benefits it offers but also the potential long-term savings and competitive advantage it can provide your company. I am confident that with this investment, you will see a rapid return on your expenditure through improved performance and cost savings.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or require further information about the product, I would be more than happy to discuss it with you. I look forward to the possibility of working together to bring this innovative solution to your organization.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $2,000,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $2,000,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
